q_en: What are the cutting tasks for customers who are PolyU?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the cutting tasks for our customer, PolyU. Here's a detailed look at the tasks:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group   | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 1       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-01-18       | Master Sewers   | 1                | 100            | 100              | 2      |
| 2       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-02-02       | Master Cutters  | 2                | 240            | 240              | 1      |
| 3       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-01-19       | Master Cutters  | 3                | 150            | 150              | 2      |
| 4       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-01-17       | Master Sewers   | 4                | 220            | 220              | 1      |
| 5       | 2024-01-10       | 2024-02-02       | Master Sewers   | 5                | 260            | 260              | 1      |
| 31      | 2024-05-10       | 2024-05-26       | Master Cutters  | 31               | 260            | 260              | 1      |

Here's a quick breakdown of the status codes:
- **1**: In Progress
- **2**: Completed

Looks like the Master Sewers and Master Cutters have been busy! If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask. üòä

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (1, 9, 13);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the orders associated with "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 31, 35, 36);
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks for the order products associated with "PolyU"
